explains: n. 雪上汽车；机动雪橇

sentences.en: His team was hit by a snowmobile driver, injuring several dogs and killing a 3-year-old male dog.
sentences.cn: 一名摩托雪橇手撞击了他的团队，有几只狗受了伤，还有一只三岁大的公狗不幸被害。

sentences.en: A snowmobile driver had repeatedly attempted to harm her and her team, and one of Zirkle's dogs had received a non-life-threatening injury.
sentences.cn: 一名摩托雪橇司机曾多次试图伤害她和她的团队，而且 Zirkle 的一只狗受了伤，但没有生命危险。

sentences.en: BRP has a good record, having previously developed breakthrough products including the Ski-Doo snowmobile and the Sea-Doo personal watercraft.
sentences.cn: BRP 有着良好的记录，此前曾开发出突破性产品，包括 Ski-Doo 雪地车和 Sea-Doo 摩托艇。
